expo.name: Social Networking Backend App
expo.description: Social Networking Backend App is a full-feature social media application ready to be deployed to the app store of your choice. The app combines Twitter, Instagram and Facebook type features, but in its own unique style. Easy to maintain and to customise with your company brand and styling, this app will jump-start the launch of your organization's social media imperium.
